a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Official development assistance to least-developed countries as a
share of donor gross national income
Net official development assistance from the OECD Development Assistance Committee donors to least-developed countries
as a percentage of their gross national income.
Data source: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
